description:
Amazon is gearing up to roll out a revamped version of its Alexa voice assistant, which is expected to be available this October, right before the US shopping rush. Internally referred to as “Remarkable,” the new technology will be powered by Anthropic’s Claude AI models. Sources close to the matter have indicated that this shift... Read more »

The post Amazon partners with Anthropic to enhance Alexa appeared first on AI News.
title: Amazon partners with Anthropic to enhance Alexa
